name: Venator
description:
On an island forgotten by time itself, a praetorian guard of the highest Roman order has come to seek his vengeance. Will he find peace in this quiet and forbidden realm, or will he only find death?

HOW TO PLAY

Explore the overworld and enter each sub zone to find power ups. You will need them to survive the final battle!

GAME CONTROLS
  • Walk - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Throw Spear - Right Mouse Click
  • Jump - Space Bar
  • You can Double Jump and Wall Jump too! Both will be necessary along your journey
CREDITS

This game is a collaboration between Elliot Dahle, Coopal00ps, and Pandamander, made in 31 days for our game-a-month challenge. Follow us here on itch, and on Twitter and Instagram for more games every month!

Amazing boss music by Prime Game Sound

Metroidvania Controller by AisuKaze Studio

And thank YOU - THE PLAYER!

NOTE FOR MAC USERS !

If you try to open the game and it says it "can't be opened", try this: Unzip the downloaded file, then right click > Open instead of left clicking to open. This will give a new option to open the game
